CraftTemplate.Name: Fist Weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Fist Weapon[h3] This is a brawl weapon template. Examples include brass knuckles and punch daggers. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Blunt Weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Blunt Weapon[h3] This is a brawl weapon template. Examples include clubs and staves. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Shield
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Shield[h3] This is a shield template. Examples include bucklers and riot shields. Please enter the description of the finished shield here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Bladed Weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Bladed Weapon[h3] This is a melee weapon template. Examples include axes, knives, and swords. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Vibro-weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vibro-weapon[h3] This is a melee weapon template. Examples include vibro-axes, vibroknives, and vibroswords. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Powered Melee Weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Powered Melee Weapon[h3] This is a melee weapon template. Examples include electrostaves and force pikes. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Powered Melee Weapon (Cutting Edge)
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Powered Melee Weapon (Cutting Edge)[h3] This is a melee weapon template. Examples include force pikes. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Powered Melee Weapon (Bludgeoning)
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Powered Melee Weapon (Bludgeoning)[h3] This is a melee weapon template. Examples include electrostaves. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Simple Projectile Weapon
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Simple Projectile Weapon[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include bows, slings, and javelins. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Solid Projectile Pistol
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Solid Projectile Pistol[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include slugthrower pistols and flechette pistols. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Solid Projectile Rifle
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Solid Projectile Rifle[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include slugthrower rifles and rail guns. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Energy Pistol
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Energy Pistol[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include blaster pistols. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Energy Rifle
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Energy Rifle[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include blaster rifles. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Heavy Energy Rifle
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Heavy Energy Rifle[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include heavy blaster rifles and disruptor rifles. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Missile Launcher
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Missile Launcher[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include missile and torpedo launchers. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Missile
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Missile[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include missiles and micro torpedoes. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Grenade
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Grenade[h3] This is a ranged weapon template. Examples include frag grenades and stun grenades. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Mine
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Mine[h3] This is a weapon template. Examples include anti-personnel mines and ion mines. Please enter the description of the finished weapon here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Standard Lightsaber
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Standard Lightsaber[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Standard Lightsaber Hilt
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Standard Lightsaber Hilt[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Precision Lightsaber
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Precision Lightsaber[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Examples include shoto, dagger lightsaber, and lightfoil. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Precision Lightsaber Hilt
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Precision Lightsaber Hilt[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Examples include shoto, dagger lightsaber, and lightfoil. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Defensive Lightsaber
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Defensive Lightsaber[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Examples include the guard shoto. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Defensive Lightsaber Hilt
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Defensive Lightsaber Hilt[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Examples include the guard shoto. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Double-Bladed Lightsaber
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Double-Bladed Lightsaber[h3] This is a lightsaber template. Examples include the double-bladed lightsaber and Temple Guard lightsaber pike. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Double-Bladed Lightsaber Hilt
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Double-Bladed Lightsaber Hilt[h3] This is a lightsaber hilt template. Examples include the double-bladed lightsaber and Temple Guard lightsaber pike. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Pole Lightsaber
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Pole Lightsaber[h3] This is a lightsaber template. Examples include the lightsaber pike and long-handle lightsaber. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Pole Lightsaber Hilt
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Pole Lightsaber Hilt[h3] This is a lightsaber template. Examples include the lightsaber pike and long-handle lightsaber. Please enter the description of the finished lightsaber here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Simple Tool
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Simple Tool[h3] This is a gadget template. Examples include climbing gear, datapads, handscanners, medpacks, toolkits, and slicer gear. Please enter the description of the finished gadget here.

Mod.MiscDesc: This tool is the right tool for the job when making {0} checks.

CraftTemplate.Name: Specialist Tool
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Specialist Tool[h3] This is a gadget template. Examples include bacta tanks, scanner dishes, table saws, and welding gear. Please enter the description of the finished gadget here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add automatic [SU] to {0} checks when using this item.

CraftTemplate.Name: Precision Instrument
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Precision Instrument[h3] This is a gadget template. Examples include microscopes, thermal cloaks, and scanner goggles. Please enter the description of the finished gadget here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Remove [SE][SE] from all {0} checks when using this item.

CraftTemplate.Name: Prosthetic Replacement
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Prosthetic Replacement[h3] This is a cybernetic template. Examples include prosthetic limbs or organs. Please enter the description of the finished cybernetic here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Cybernetic Appendage (Brawn)
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Cybernetic Appendage (Brawn)[h3] This is a cybernetic template. Examples include enhanced arms and legs. Please enter the description of the finished cybernetic here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Cybernetic Appendage (Agility)
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Cybernetic Appendage (Agility)[h3] This is a cybernetic template. Examples include enhanced arms and legs. Please enter the description of the finished cybernetic here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Cybernetic Implant
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Cybernetic Implant[h3] This is a cybernetic template. Examples include brain implants and enhanced senses. Please enter the description of the finished cybernetic here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Trench
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Trench[h3] This is a trench fortification template. Please enter the description of the finished fortification here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Bunker
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Bunker[h3] This is a bunker fortification template. Please enter the description of the finished fortification here.

CraftTemplate.Name: Blind
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Blind[h3] This is a blind fortification template. Please enter the description of the finished fortification here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Provides concealment equivalent to dense underbrush (Adds [SE][SE][SE] to any Ranged Light, Ranged Heavy, Gunnery, and Perception checks against concealed targets. Adds [BO][BO][BO] to any Stealth checks made by concealed characters).

VehicleProfile.Name: Space Station
VehicleProfile.Crew: 60,000 or more administrators, technicians, and laborers

CraftTemplate.Name: Custom Vehicle
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Custom Vehicle[h3] This is a custom vehicle template. This will create a vehicle from the frame of an existing vehicle. Please enter the description of the finished vehicle here.

CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Single Ion Coil[h3] This is a Single Ion Coil vehicle engine template.

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 0 or 1
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouettes 0 or 1 vehicles.

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 2
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouette 2 vehicles.[P] [B]Additional Resources Needed:[b] 1,000 credits for additional supplies

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 3
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouette 3 vehicles.[P] [B]Additional Resources Needed:[b] 10,000 credits for additional supplies

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 4
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouette 4 vehicles.[P] [B]Additional Resources Needed:[b] A team of 5 or more, 25,000 credits for additional supplies

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 5 or 6
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouette 5 or 6 vehicles.[P] [B]Additional Resources Needed:[b] A team of 100 or more, 100,000 credits for additional supplies

CraftTemplate.Name: Vehicle Assembly - Silh. 7 to 9
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Vehicle Assembly[h3] Obtain the results of the final assembly for silhouette 7 to 9 vehicles.[P] [B]Additional Resources Needed:[b] A team of 5,000 or more, 2,000,000 credits for additional supplies

CraftTemplate.Name: Monotask Chassis
CraftTemplate.Description: This is a droid chassis. Please enter the description of the finished droid here.

AvAbility.Name: Droid
AvAbility.Description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink, and can survive in vacuum or underwater. Immune to poisons and toxins.

CraftTemplate.Name: Labor Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Labor Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically obsessed with their single area of expertise.

CraftTemplate.Name: Combat Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Combat Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used for security purposes.

CraftTemplate.Name: Translation Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Translation Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used for etiquette and protocol.

CraftTemplate.Name: Repair Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Repair Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used to repair machines.

CraftTemplate.Name: Navigation Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Navigation Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used for astronavigation purposes.

CraftTemplate.Name: Healing Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Healing Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used for medical purposes.

CraftTemplate.Name: Elimination Directives
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Elimination Directives[h3] Droids with these directives are typically used for assassination.

CraftTemplate.Name: Acid
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Acid[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Target must make [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check[b]. If failed, takes 2 wound at start of turn for 3 rounds, plus 1 round per [TH] rolled.

CraftTemplate.Name: Draught of Fire
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Draught of Fire[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: For the next round (or 30 minutes), user's unarmed attacks gain Burn 4, or add +1 if Burn is already possessed.

CraftTemplate.Name: Elixir of Vigor
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Elixir of Vigor[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When consumed, Brawn is increased by 1 and Willpower is decreased by 1. This effect lasts until the end of the following round.

CraftTemplate.Name: Healing Potion
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Healing Potion[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When consumed, one Critical Injury of severity [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI])[b] or less is healed.

CraftTemplate.Name: Poison
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Poison[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Target must immediately make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Resilience check[b]. If failed, suffer 5 wounds plus 1 strain per [TH].

CraftTemplate.Name: Potion of Wills
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Potion of Wills[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Target must make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Discipline check[b]. If failed, Willpower is counted as 0 for remainder of encounter or 1 hour, increased once per [TH] rolled.
Cannot be applied to a weapon. Potion must be ingested

CraftTemplate.Name: Stimulant
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Stimulant[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When consumed, target increases strain threshold by 5 for remainder of encounter (or one hour).

CraftTemplate.Name: Water of Life
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Water of Life[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When consumed, target heals all wounds and strain they are currently suffering.
If target died during the current encounter, target makes a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Discipline[b] or [B]Resilience check[b]. If successful, they come back to life and heal one Critical Injury.
If consumed while making a Force power check, suffer 1 Conflict and gain [LI][DA]. If making a Conjure check, add [LI][LI][DA][DA] instead.

CraftTemplate.Name: Weakening Potion
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Weakening Potion[h3] This is an alchemical potion template. Please enter the description of the finished potion here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Target must immediately make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Resilience check[b]. If failed, wound and strain threshold is reduced by half (rounding up) for remainder of encounter (or one hour), increased once per [TH] rolled.

CraftTemplate.Name: Amulet of Power
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Amulet of Power[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: User may employ talisman to roll 1 additional [FO] when making a Force power check or a skill check. The talisman then crumbles to dust.

CraftTemplate.Name: Fetish of Fear
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Fetish of Fear[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: Target an enemy attempting to move within engaged range to make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Fear check[b] as an out-of-turn incidental. If failed, target cannot perform the move maneuver.

CraftTemplate.Name: Neural Charm
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Neural Charm[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When user makes a Knowledge check, may suffer strain up to Intellect to add that many [BO] to check.

CraftTemplate.Name: Protective Amulet
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Protective Amulet[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: User may ignore environmental affects such as fire, acid, and corrosive atmosphere. They act as if in a standard gravity field, may breathe underwater and in a vacuum, and may ignore the Burn quality when hit by an attack.

CraftTemplate.Name: Healing Accelerant
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Healing Accelerant[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When recovering strain or wounds, may recover that amount plus 1 instead.

CraftTemplate.Name: Shield Amulet
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Shield Amulet[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When taking damage involving a Force power in some way, may choose to reduce damage taken by half (rounding up).
May only be used once per session.

CraftTemplate.Name: Talisman of Fate
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Talisman of Fate[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When the GM flips a Destiny Point to upgrade the ability or difficulty of a skill check involving the user, the user may downgrade the difficulty of the check.
Talisman dissolves after a single use.

CraftTemplate.Name: Token of Resistance
CraftTemplate.Description: [H3]Token of Resistance[h3] This is an alchemical talisman template. Please enter the description of the finished talisman here.

Mod.MiscDesc: When user is targeted by an opposed social skill check where a Force power is involved, the opposing character rolls one fewer [FO].
